output_data.summary: Follow-up session detailing worsening depressive symptoms, passive suicidal ideation, and significant functional decline (missing work) following a 4-week trial of *Sertraline* 50mg.
output_data.reasoning: The patient reports critical vegetative symptoms (e.g., *early morning awakening*, *weight loss*, *anhedonia*) and endorses passive death ideation, necessitating an immediate safety screen (C-SSRS) and escalation of the established treatment plan (*Sertraline* dose increase to 100mg).
